title: "Galactic Outpost"
content:
üöÄ Welcome to Galactic Outpost! ü™ê

Our website is dedicated to all things space-related, from the latest news and discoveries to stunning visuals of our universe. 

Explore our collection of breathtaking wallpapers featuring planets, stars, galaxies, and more. Our curated selection includes both real-life photographs and artistic interpretations of the cosmos.

Whether you're a space enthusiast or just looking for a new desktop background, Galactic Outpost has something for everyone. Join us on a journey through the final frontier.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An illustration of a space station in orbit around a gas giant planet, with rings and storms visible in the background."

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
